channel.title: Thematic Dance Productions on Prabhat
channel.description: Recent content in Thematic Dance Productions on Prabhat

item.title: Thematic Dance Productions
item.description: Thematic Dance Productions a. 7 Rays of 7 Hills: The entire universe is filled with colours and every colour has an interpretation. 7 Rays of 7 Hills interprets the colourful rays as the rays of grace by the Lord of 7 hills, Srinivasa.
